translations: n.（Magnolia）人名；（意）马尼奥利亚；（英）马格诺利娅

sentences.sentence: Favorite Movies: My Best Friend's Wedding, Steel Magnolias, Titanic.
sentences.translation: 最喜欢的电影：《我最好朋友的婚礼》，《决战尤玛镇》，《泰坦尼克号》。

sentences.sentence: To which Bryant replied: "We're not going to go watch 'Steel Magnolias,' or something like that, you know what I'm saying?"
sentences.translation: 而科比则回应到：“我们又不是再看《钢木兰》之类的影片，你应该知道我在说什么吧？”
